name: Wizard Maze
description:
Hi this is a non stop maze runner when you're not allowed to touch the walls and have to get to a portal at the end of the level.  The graphics are extremley simple and I haven't gotten to the point in this project to show the characters as running.  In my opinion this game is very hard.  However this adds to the game as it is multiplayer and so forth a lot of fun when you're having a laugh.

Thankfully there are a couple of levels which should satisfy you for a good amount of time if you ever wanted to play this game.

Unlike my other projects, this one, if the idea was percepted well, would be completely upgraded to make it half descent.  

Please leave comments after downloading to say if you like the idea, even if you don't like the game.

Thankyou.
